Entries.fall_Thu: #$1 AbigailHAND#Last night I dreamt that my left hand had turned into a gigantic %noun. Does that mean anything?#$e#%{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailName}} doesn't seem to be interested in talking right now.

Entries.Bad_9: I wonder if I could've done better... I was very good friends with {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianName}} before we met. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianGender}}}} was probably the one...$s

Entries.marriage_Mon.000: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreGender}}}} seems to be doing okay without me around.

BeforeMovie.Text: I love horror movies... I hope it's scary!$h

DuringMovie.Text: Haha! It's not scary, but I love it.$h

AfterMovie.Text: That was pretty campy, but I liked it.$h
